fields.name: mexican_chiapas
fields.description: Medium-bodied coffee with balanced acidity, featuring flavors of dark chocolate, nuts, and a touch of bright citrus.

fields.name: costa_rican_tarraz√∫
fields.description: Offers a light and crisp body with notes of bright citrus, floral tones, and a subtle nuttiness.

fields.name: caramel_latte
fields.description: Made with espresso, steamed milk, and a shot of caramel syrup. Topped with a dollop of frothed milk.

fields.name: vanilla_latte
fields.description: Made with espresso, steamed milk, and a shot of vanilla syrup. Topped with a dollop of frothed milk.

fields.name: italian_roast
fields.description: Deep, dark and shiny beans with bold, smoky flavors and a rich, full body. Minimal acidity.

fields.name: brazilian_santos
fields.description: Known for its mild acidity, medium body, and nutty, chocolatey flavors with a slight hint of fruitiness.

fields.name: spanish_roast
fields.description: Extremely dark and often has a noticeable charred flavor, with very low acidity and a heavy body.

fields.name: hazelnut_latte
fields.description: Made with espresso, steamed milk, and a shot of hazelnut syrup. Topped with a dollop of frothed milk.

fields.name: guatemalan_antigua
fields.description: Offers a balanced cup with medium acidity, full body, and flavors of chocolate, caramel, and mild fruity notes.

fields.name: cortado_espresso
fields.description: Made by combining equal parts espresso and steamed milk, resulting in a balanced and creamy coffee.

fields.name: kenya_aa
fields.description: Has a bright acidity with wine-like characteristics, often featuring fruity and citrusy notes.

fields.name: sumatra_manheling
fields.description: Full-bodied coffee with low acidity, known for its earthy, herbal, and chocolatey flavors.

fields.name: doppio_espresso
fields.description: A double shot of espresso, providing a strong, concentrated coffee flavor.

fields.name: ethiopian_yirgacheffe
fields.description: Known for its bright acidity, floral notes, and fruity flavors, often with hints of citrus and berries.

fields.name: macchiato_espresso
fields.description: Espresso stained or marked with a small amount of frothy milk, offering a strong coffee flavor with a hint of creaminess.

fields.name: vienna_roast
fields.description: Dark, but not as extreme as French or Italian roasts. Features a full body with a slight smokiness and dark caramelized sugars.

fields.name: ristretto_espresso
fields.description: A shorter, even more concentrated shot of espresso, extracted with less water for an intense, bold taste.

fields.name: mocha_latte
fields.description: Combines espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, creating a rich, chocolatey coffee drink.

fields.name: columbian_supremo
fields.description: Known for its mild acidity, medium body, and notes of bright citrus, caramel, and chocolate.
